Fall_River.Freetown (MBTA station):
Freetown is a proposed commuter rail station on the Fall River Subdivision in the Assonet village of Freetown, Massachusetts. Under current plans, the station would open for MBTA Commuter Rail service in 2022 as part of the first phase of the South Coast Rail project.


== History ==


=== Previous stations ===
The Fall River Railroad opened from Myricks to Fall River in June 1845, and to South Braintree in December 1846.
